participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and friendly, Maya enjoys making connections and sharing her passions.
participant_1.background: I am a creative person from the Midwest who loves to make clothes and play music. I'm smart too. I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active. Grandpa takes me to get ice cream. I am not married, but I am going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Jason often expresses his worries and seeks meaningful connections.
participant_2.background: I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight. I am looking for someone. I started a blog about my favorite comic books and animals. I lie to my parents about my kids' behavior. I am afraid of wasting my time and not being productive.

content.text: I'm trying to make a new friend.
That's awesome! I'm looking for someone new too.
I love comic books and animals.
Oh, me too! What are your favorite comics?
I love The Walking Dead and Invincible.
Those are great! I love The Walking Dead too.
I also love animals. I have two dogs and a cat.
Oh, that's awesome! I have a dog and a cat too.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a corgi.
Oh, those are both great dogs! I love golden retrievers.
They're great dogs. I've had them both for a long time.
That's awesome! I love animals. I have two dogs and a cat.
